page.title: 02SHOPPING IN BELLE VALE
page.content: The main shops for the Belle Vale area are situated in the Belle Vale shopping precinct.The types of shops include,a cobblers,a music shop and a decorating shop.There are too many food shops & not enough shops selling toys & books.The only newsagent in the precinct has recently been closed down. There are two supermarkets {(WOOLWORTH & TESCOS)}which people find convenient as they can get everything at once, but there are usually long queues.Though the precinct caters for nearly every necessity ,& is very busy at the weekend,there is no bank or post office.Consequently the building society branch in the precinct is well used.The nearest bank is situated in the Gateacre Park block of shops which is the other main place to shop.The Gateacre shops aren't as big as the ones in the precinct but are as good.
